segments.advisor_message: Alright, so let’s recap what we discussed about your dependents. You mentioned uh, that your son’s name is, um, Jake, right?
segments.client_message: Yeah, yeah, that's right, Jake. He’s, uh, my only kid.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! And when was Jake born again? Just wanna make sure I have the exact date.
segments.client_message: Oh, um, he was born on 15-07-2015, like a summer baby.

segments.advisor_message: Summer baby, nice! So, he’s considered a dependent until what date? If there's a specific one, that is.
segments.client_message: Uh, I think it’s until he turns 18, so that would be... 15-07-2033.
